properties.name: publish.status
properties.description: Defines whether the machine status should be published via the event bus

properties.name: publish.status.interval
properties.description: Defines how much time between each publish is passed in ms

properties.name: pid.logging.enable
properties.description: Enables logging for each pid controller. Files are in the folder PID

properties.name: pid.logging.folder
properties.description: Folder that the logfiles will appear in
